name: Basketball Shoot Pro
description:
Basketball Shoot Pro is an simple but very addictive game which base on realistic physics.
The quantity of the basketballs is not limited,your goal is to shoot them for a better score.

There is No rules. Just flick.
But itís not that easy, just madly addictive.

How To Play Basketball Shoot Pro:
Slide you finger quickly anywhere on screen to shoot the basketball.
